籤詩版本二:
Ndifuna ukurhwebesha i-Immortal Gui kwiBhotwe le-Toad, kodwa ndiya kuvula isango lezulu kwaye ndikukhulule.
Ngokukhawuleza, iindaba zimnandi, wonke umntu uyahleka kwiintyatyambo eziphezu kwentaba
詩意:
Le hexagram ibambe uphawu lwe-osmanthus engafiyo.
Kufuneka kubekho abantu abahloniphekileyo kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Umdla wabarhwebi. Kukho (akukho) ingozi ekuyinxibe. Isigulo salungiswa kwaye isimangalo sasonjululwa. Yenza nantoni na onokuyenza.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yiba nobubele nolwazelelelo
UGao Huaide (926-982), igama lembeko uZangyong, wazalelwa eChangshan, eZhending (ngoku eyiZhengding, eHebei).
Ngexesha le "Chenqiao Mutiny", ngenxa yokuba uGao Huaide exhasa uZhao Kuangyin njengomlawuli, wanyuselwa waba ngusekela-mhloli oyintloko phambi kwebhotwe.
UGao Huaide naye watshata udade weNgoma uTaizu uZhao Kuangyin (uZhao Kuangyin wayenoodade wabo ababini, omnye wasweleka emncinci kwaye wabizwa ngokuba nguPrincess Chen; omnye wayetshate noMiford, kodwa ngelishwa umyeni wakhe wasweleka kwaye ngoku wayengumhlolokazi. UZhao Kuangyin ogama lakhe linguZhao Kuangyin nguye inkosazana endala kaYan). . Isihloko esisemthethweni yayiyiNkosana uConsort Duwei.
(Ukuba ligorha elisungulayo kunye nokutshata udade womlawuli, akukho mfuneko yakukhathazeka ngokungabi naso isikhundla esisemthethweni.)
聖意: Umzi awukho mdleni ulungile kulowo uyamlungela umntu uyamlungela amashishini alungele umtshato aybabi ebantwini iyingozi kwimibungu yasemasimini , imbi kwimfuyo emithandathu, imbi ekufumaneni abantu, kunzima ukuba abantu bafumane abantu, imbi ekumangaleni esidlangalaleni, imbi ngokufuduka, imbi kwizinto ezilahlekileyo, ilungele izifo, I-Anshan kunye namangcwaba zindala kwaye zilungile.
